title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Using Tools and Agents in Generative AI applications (TNC320)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在生成式AI应用中使用工具和代理 (TNC320)
abstract: Join us for an engaging session on AI Agents and Tools in AWS, where we’ll explore how to build intelligent, autonomous systems using Amazon Bedrock and open-source frameworks. Learn about function calling, ReAct patterns, and AWS’s comprehensive agent platforms. We’ll dive into practical demonstrations using Strands and CrewAI, and discover how to leverage protocols like MCP and A2A for seamless tool integration and agent collaboration. Perfect for developers looking to create production-ready AI solutions.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，参加一场关于 AWS 中 AI 代理和工具的精彩会议，我们将探讨如何使用 Amazon Bedrock 和开源框架构建智能自主系统。了解函数调用、ReAct 模式以及 AWS 的综合代理平台。我们将深入演示如何使用 Strands 和 CrewAI，并探索如何利用 MCP 和 A2A 等协议实现无缝工具集成和代理协作。非常适合希望创建生产就绪 AI 解决方案的开发人员。
